entries.description: Added a combo kill announcer which will display the number of enemies killed in a 0.25s period.
Bazooka Launcher has a new upgrade which deals bleed damage to enemies hit by the explosion.
Reduced the amount of shake on the player's HP text when low HP, made the text color orange when at low hp.
Fixed issue where neutral element cards would apply their status effect twice when hitting a marked target
Added a developer console which can be accessed by pressing the ` key. The console will show log, warning and error messages.
Marking Arrow has a new upgrade path which allows it to pierce through enemies and deal damage and apply mark to all enemies it hits.

There is a new upgrade system in the game! You can now find anvils on Rest Stages which will allow you to upgrade your cards. At the moment most cards have a single upgrade path with simple stat improvements though I plan to add more interesting upgrades in the future.
Fire an electric orb in a straight line which deals damage and stuns the first enemy hit
Changed the key to activate Focus Mode from Q to F.
Added the ability to view your deck whilst in the Stage Select screen.
Added this, the changelog! Now you can see what's new in the game in the main menu!
